title: The effect of the ageing process on the desorption of nonylphenol in black carbon-sediment systems: a kineto-mechanistic and modeling investigation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,499-509
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00446E, Paper
Mingyang Sun, Han Liu, Feixiang Liu, Hong Yang, Guanghuan Cheng
The content of NP in the desorbing fraction was nearly equivalent to that of NP in partition sites in aged FC-sediment systems, but the release risk of NP from aged RC-sediment systems would be overestimated according to this rule.
